title: The Chilling Adventures of Sabrina Episode 3 "The Trial of Sabrina Spellman" Breakdown!
author: Think Story
comment: Did I like this episode? Guilty until proven innocent 😉
Damn Ambrose has been hitting the gym hard during his house arrest
I, too, thought that Luke had something to do with the iguana's death. I don't trust him. Yet.
Although I'm almost done with CAOS I always watch your videos on each episode. You catch things I didn't and I love to hear your opinions on stuff.
This was a funny episode. It was like watching a demonic episode of "Judging amy"... Too old of a reference? A satanic episode of "Suits".
description:
Get ready to cast some spells because it's my new breakdown series for "The Chilling Adventures of Sabrina." This is for season one episode 3, "The Trial of Sabrina Spellman."

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/ThinkStoryYT
